ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: undead bard question
ygData.msgSnippet: The undead bard DID spawn again and shortly after, so did the regular Trakanon. Another guild beat us there to kill him so I am once again waiting for an
ygData.messageBody:
The undead bard DID spawn again and shortly after, so did the regular Trakanon. Another guild beat us there to kill him so I am once again waiting for an undead bard spawn.
For those of you interested in hitting Sebilis, I recommend going right after you scribe song of twilight because your group WILL expect you to mezz and I have found this song far superior to Charm in dungeons (and pixie strike is resisted too much). There is an issue with Sebilis though -- that is getting out again. It stinks that your group will have to clear a path to the portal when you have to leave.
My solution is the gate hammer quest in the Overthere. I used my deciever mask to do the quest:
Give the foreman a piece of jade to stick in his eye socket (or somesuch place P) and he'll reward you with a hammer that procs gate to the Overthere. You'll materialize in the shipyard -- inside the ship being built. You'll need mezz to stop the Skele that will immediately attack you. Throw on the drum, right click your mask and beat feet.
If you haven't been to Sebilis, I highly recommend it. You'll meet some of the best players in the game there, and the loot/xp are great. Just bring that hammer or a gate potion)
Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
Bard of 55 songs

darkfox021 <blzkrg@...> wrote: Someone on Concert Hall suggested a theory (actually did a bit of
watching to come up with it) that the Undead Bard is on a flat 20
hour spawn cycle and is KOS to Trakanon.

If this is true, the seemingly random spawn times seem to come from
people not knowing when he actually died last (i.e. most of the time
that knowing precisely when Trakanon spawns) and relating his spawn
time to Trak's death, not the Undead Bards.

For example, the server pops and both Trak and UDB spawn. Trak kills
UDB. 20 hours from that point, if Trak is dead, the UDB will spawn
and stay up. If Trak dies 18 hours after server pop, the UDB will be
up in 2 hours. If Trak dies 21 hours after server pop, the UDB will
be up in 19 hours (he'd already spawned and was whacked by Trak once).

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Retired



--- In eqbards@y..., "Azerael Ng'Ataman" <azerael@i...> wrote:
> He is something akin to Ragefire, he seems to spawn several times
> between the 'real' Trakanon. It seems to be a random amount of
time as well, between 12 and 36 hours I've been told most often,
though some say as much as 72. Haven't sat and timed him myself so I
can't say for sure.
